creator: mat@sunrise.ch
text: I've found the solution. Under uss/zOS the SystemProperty file.encoding by default is IBM-1047. At the Moment i changed to ISO-8859-1 it works.
Thanks for letting us know, marking this as a configuration issue not a POI bug.
